text: Ionel Petrov (born 7 October 1934) is a Romanian rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxless four where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Romania Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sulina Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Romania Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Ionel Petrov
